commit.message:
tree-object-size.c (addr_object_size): Fix a pasto in the last change.

	* tree-object-size.c (addr_object_size): Fix a pasto in the last
	change.

	* gcc.dg/builtin-object-size-7.c: New test.

From-SVN: r148503
